name: Talking Betty Bear
description:
Betty is here! She’s the sweetest, most tender-hearted little bear around. She’s Teddy Bear’s best friend and now she can be your friend too!

Betty is a cute, pink little bear who likes hearts, kisses, and flowers. She loves playing with her friends and giving hugs to everyone.

Make soap bubble hearts and discover little gifts and surprises with your new plush pal. Enjoy fun and educational number games, watch Betty dance to her favorite music box, and get a visit from your friend Teddy when you least expect it!

She wants to be your friend…start playing with Betty Bear today!

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH TALKING BETTY BEAR
-Betty repeats what you say!
-interact with her and watch her funny reactions
-play with Betty and her music box!
-learn numbers with fun activities!
-share personalized videos with your friends!
-strike a pose and take silly photos with Betty

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad must have a microphone or headset. If not, the “repeat what I say” feature willl not work.
